name: Improved Unarmed Strike
text: You are skilled at fighting while unarmed.
benefit: You are considered to be armed even when unarmed—you do not provoke attacks of opportunity when you attack foes while unarmed. Your unarmed strikes can deal lethal or nonlethal damage, at your choice.
normal: Without this feat, you are considered unarmed when attacking with an unarmed strike, and you can deal only nonlethal damage with such an attack.
staminaText: When you deal nonlethal damage with an unarmed strike, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to deal an amount of additional nonlethal damage equal to double the amount of stamina points you spent.
mythicText: Your unarmed strikes are more powerful than others.
mythicBenefit: You can add half your tier to your damage with unarmed strikes. As a swift action, you can expend one use of mythic power to overcome the hardness of objects with your unarmed strikes. This effect last for a number of rounds equal to your tier. If an object’s hardness is greater than 15, you don’t ignore any of its hardness.
text_zh: 你精通徒手作战的技巧。
benefit_zh: 即使徒手也视同持有武器，也就是说当你徒手攻击时，不会引发借机攻击。此外，你可以选择让你的徒手击打造成致命或非致命伤害。
normal_zh: 无此专长者若徒手攻击则视为未武装，也只能造成非致命伤害。
mythicText_zh: 你的徒手打击比其他人更强。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你能够将你的阶层的一半加到徒手打击的伤害上。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力使用徒手打击克服物体的硬度。这个效果持续的轮数等同于你的阶层。若物体的硬度比15还高，你就无法忽略它的硬度了。
staminaText_zh: 当你用徒手击打造成非致命伤害时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来造成等同于你消耗耐力两倍的额外非致命伤害。
